metadata.name: THE OUTLINE
metadata.description:
Dubai is one of only a few locations worldwide where iconic architecture is not only encouraged, but actively pursued. Being a resident in Dubai, I am blessed to witness such iconic structures that have inspired me to see the world with my own individual perspective. 

Presenting "The Outline" a panoramic view of Dubai Marina skyline created on the basis of an imaginary visualization of the artist. Essence, with style and sobriety. 

Artist : Sajin Sasidharan

Collection Name: Architecture & Cityscapes 

Edition: 1/1

Awards : Pano Awards 2017, Winner Exposure international photography awards 2017

Size: â€Š3840 x 1087

Genre: fine art Architecture 

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
